name: Truth Be told (Zaikiai)
description:
Your friend Anna went missing last summer in the mountains, going to a family cabin or so you thought. In order to solve the mystery of your missing friend you travel up to the cabin in hopes to find some evidence of where she might be or even her body. Although when you get there you find out things are worse than you thought. Something is hunting you, trying to keep you from finding out the secrets.

Collect the 5 pieces of paper(evidence) while evading the monster!
